Blog.post: Hello!! Tomorrow is the well inticipated day I return to TX!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! But I did have a good time in CT!! Actually, today I went to see my Aunt Pam, my Grandmother, and a couple of other relatives. I went swimming today in a fairly cold pool, and it felt gooooooood. And I'm finally gonna be able to post my "Pic's of the Week" DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! HUZA!!! HOOPLA!!! and twa!! Now, for the last time in CT, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!

HELLO!! Only 2 more days 'til TX day!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!! I'll be able to goof with my bestest buds in the world, and I can finally play those computer games I bought, and I will be able to post my funny "Pic of the Week" on me blog!!!! YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAY!!! DJLKFJEIHAFJDBNSAUIFVHFJNBGJAHFUDA.....Twa! And I'll be able to say, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!! In TX!! Your Heart is Black urlLink What Color is Your Heart? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla I took an Online Quiz!

Hello!! It's me again! Just 3 more days 'til I come back to TX!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!! I still can't decide what I want to do first when I get to TX!! I'm so anxious!! HUZA!!!! They're making a 3rd Spider-Man movie (HOLY CRAP) Also, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!

Hello!! Only 4 more days until I come back to TX, I can't wait, I'm so excited!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!! There is so much I wanna do when I get there! I'm gonna put my new computer games on my Windows XP computer, I'm gonna goof with my buds (you know who you are)! And I'll finally get to put up my "Pics of the Week" on my blog!! YAAAY!!! HUZA!!..........Twa! But intill then, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

Hello!! I'm counting down the days 'til I'm back in TX!! Today we are currently at July 25, meaning just 5 more days left!! And when I get back to TX, can finally start posting my "Pic's of the Week!!" (With the added help of John of course). Oh also I just recently saw "Around the World in 80 Days" It was pretty funny, but not the best. "Pirates of the Carribean" was the best. But I really wanna see "Spider-Man 2" THAT looks real good. sooooooooooooooo.........bye Oh, one more thing, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

Hello!! I'm back from LONG ISLAND and am now in CT again, and I will return to TX in 6 days from today! HUZA!!! Also, while I was up in LONG ISLAND, I got some new video games. For my GBA SP I got the classic "Super Mario Bros" and for my computer at home in TX I got the "Sega Smash Pack" which has 8 seperate games in it, including "Crazy Taxi" "Sonic R" "Sonic CD" "Sonic & Knuckles Collection" and much more!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! And if you don't like that, then guess what, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

Hello!!! It's me again!! I'm at Heather and Anna's house today. If you don't know who they are, then it sux to be you. HAHAHAHA. jk jk. Anyways, yesterday I when to the beach and got sunburnt on the back of my neck, both my knees, my left foot, both my forearms, and on my face. But ohhh well. (Note to self: use sunscreen). And today, I went to Splish Splash!!!! (water amusment park) It was kool and I didn't get any more suburns!!! YAAAAAAAAAAY!!! Oh ya, I almost forgot, Heather and Anna have a lil bro named Tim. He's ok. Also, they live in LONG ISLAND!!! *twirls pointing finger in are* Anna is a Bench *inside joke* It's time to rap things up by saying, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

LEVY KEEP AWAY FROM MY BLOG!!!!!!! I'M NOT LAZY, I JUST COULD NOT GET ON THE INTERNET BECAUSE THE COMPUTER HERE BROKE FOR A SMALL WILE!!!!! IF I WANT YOU TO POST I'LL TELL YOU TOO!!!! (huff and puff with an angery tone!) That goes for you 2 John (If you know my password) Oh, Levy one more thing IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!!!!! P.S. THAT PIC IS NOT ME IN A THONG!!! I'M A BOY FOR GOD'S SAKE!!! (Even though It's a pretty kool pic). SO LEVY I AM GIVING YOU PERMISSION TO GET ON MY BLOG BUT ONLY TO TAKE THAT PIC OFF!!! THAT MEANS NO POSTING, NO CHANGING FONT SIZE, COLOR, OR ANYTHING LIKE THAT YOU S.O.B.!!!!!!!!!

This is one of Levy's unoficial posts where i post for the lazy one, who only posts once a week, anyway, your probably glad i did this! at any rate, red gets back to houston in a bout 2 weeks. In the meantime... IT DOESNT MATTER WHAT YOU TINK!

Hello, It's me again. Today me and my dad went to a music store with guitars and drums and all kinds of musicy stuff. That reminds me, for those that don't know, I'm learning Bass Guitar! It's pretty kool, but I actually wanted to play the Drums. Oh well, I also just recently got Sonic Advanced 3! It is so kool...........ish. Anyways, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!

Hello, In case you haven't noticed yet, I've been changing my theme songs from one thing to another. Soooooo get used to it. Anyways I just resently saw the movie "Big Fish" it was ok but not the best. Personally I thought the best was "Pirates of the Carribean" THAT WAS A GOOOOOOOD MOVIE!!!! Anyways IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!

Hey everyone, I'm currently in Conneticut visiting my dad (long story) and I will return to Texas by June 30th. But in the mean time I get to do all kinds of kool stuff. Just 2 days ago I made burgers on a grill! WOW!! Also in aboot a week I will go to Rhode Island and visit some friends (Anna, Heather, Tim). They're pretty kool, once ya get to know them. I'm still working on my pictures so don't worry aboot those yet. Well see ya and in the mean time, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!

HEY EVERBODY I'M BACK AND BETTER THAN EVA!!!!! I swear I'm gonnna post more often unlike last time. And I got a new gig too. I call it "RED'S PIC OF THE WEEK"!!!!! Which is me making a funny video game picture!!!! And I'll start that ASAP!!!! Don't worry I'll make some changes to my blog!! In the mean time "IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!" inside joke

Hello!! I bet your wondering wat my title is all aboot. One word sums it up, Sleepover!! That's right, and at John's house. It was yesterday. Also I heard an awsome song called "The Hampster Dance" It is Da' Bomb!!! Me and John are currently hanging out and doing stuff. Today I bought "Spider Man 2" for the GCN!! And John bought a hub for his Xbox. DAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! and if you don't like the Hampster Dance, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!
Here is yet another random picture for you to bear witness to..... IT DOESNT MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!! especially you Levy

Hello. I've got some bad news for all my fans (if any). But my "Pics of the Week" will NOT be shown weekly. They will be shown once in a while. Meaning at random days. The reason is, my friend John is the only one that can put my pics on my blog, and it is going to get tiresom (check spelling) after a while. In other news, nothing special happend today, and if you think my blog is kool, then IM me at SonicRTR or Sonic8991. DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!! and if you think my blog ISN'T kool well guess wat, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!

Yesterday was Jacob's B-Day Party, and It was AWSOME!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!! We went swimming in his swimming pool, we played video games, and best of all, Jake made me pass out for like 7 seconds!!! IT WAS SOOOOOOO KOOOOOOOL!!!!!! HOOPLA!!! Today I got to stay at Jake's untill bout, 6:45 p.m. And before all of that, I went to E.B. Games and got myself an "Action Replay" for my GCN. the AR is basically a Gameshark for the GCN. AND IT IS DA' BOMB!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! P.S. IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!

Hello. Today is Today!!! But yesterday, I went to Jacob's house and he showed me a cool trick that made me pass out for 5 seconds. It was tight!!! And he's gonna do it again, on Sunday when I go over to his house for his B-Day!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!! And today, I'm just goofin around with Levy, and making more pic's cause I can. Oh ya, I hardly forgot, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!
heres the pic of the week sorry its late ha ha ha hope you enjoy my creativeness! and if you dont like it...well, IT DOESNT MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!

Hello!!! This has been the most awsome weekend ever!!! First on Friday, me, John, and Cameron went to Levy's house for his B-Day. Then the next day we all spent the night at MY house!! It would have been better if Levy didn't have to leave so early. He had to leave at 10 a.m.!! Can you believe that?!?!? For crying out loud!! Ohhh well. IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

Hello everbody!!! Today is the well inticipated Birthday Par-Tay of the Levymister!! And I get to be the first one to go and goof with my bud!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!! I get to eat cake, and give Levy money!! YAAAAAAAAY!!!! In other news, I'm still making more new Pics of the Week!! I know your gonna like 'em and if you don't like 'em, well, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

Hello everyone. In case you didn't guess it when you saw the title for this post, It's Levy's Birthday!!! Actually it was yesterday and we went to Hooters to celebrate!!! Ohhhhhh Yaaaaaa!!!! On Friday, is Levy's actually party!!! HUZA!!! It is gonna be sweet!! And after that, on Tuesday, I get to go to Jacob's B-Day Par-tay!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! If you think you've got a better life than me then, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

DAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! It's time for the first pic of the week!!! Funny huh? I've got more and if you wanna see 'em, you'll have to check out my blog every Monday. If I forget to post it, then I'll post it on Tuesday probably. THANX JOHN!!! YOU RULE!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!! and in the mean time, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

Sorry I haven't posted lately, but I've been busy going to people's houses and partying (check spelling) all the time!!! Just recently, I went to Peter's house (rich guy) and celebrated Cameron's birthday party, It was kool!! Today, I went to Levy's house and played "Mario Kart: Double Dash!!" and unlocked Petey Parahna and King Boo. They are Da' Bomb!!! and in the mean time, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!

HELLO!!! Still in TX and never been more happy!! Besides the fact that I got Summer School to attend to. I have to wake up at 7 a.m. and make it there at 8 a.m. Fortunantly it gets out at 1 p.m. and I only got to go for 5 more days, then I'm free!!!!!!! YAAAAY!! In other news, I went to Cameron's B-Day Par-Tay!! WOOO HOOO!! It was Da' Bomb!!! DAAAAAAAAAAA!!! and in the mean time, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

HELLO!! Today is awsome!! Today is 4th of July, AND today I'm invited to Cameron's Birthday Party and a Sleep Over!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!! Today is gonna be an action packed day, HUZA!! JDIOGNRIOQNAPVFHDSIAFNH!! I'm so excited!! I can't wait!! OHHH, also guess what!!! IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

Hello!! It has been very eventful in TX lately. On the day after I got to TX, I goofed with Levy and he showed my "The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords" and it is awsome!! The day after that, I went to my good bud Jacob's, that I haven't seen in months!!! Then, later that day, I went to John's house for a Pizza/Sleepover Par-tay!!! And we Played a bunch of "Halo" "WrestleMania XX" and "Four Swords", It was the koolest!!!!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!! and if you don't like it then, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! Yesterday, I got back in TX!!! YAAAAAAAAAAAY!!! But unfortunanly, it was a chaotic trip. I first had to wake up at around 7 a.m. and I had to fly to Chicago and then I could go to TX. But when I was in Chicago me and my brother, Kyle, went to look for our termanal. However, the ticket did not say what termanal to go to. So, we asked for directions, and we found our termanal. But then, the speaker came on and said that our flight was delayed AND changed to a differ termanal. So, my and my bro had to walk, literaly, across the airport to get to our new termanal. When we finally got there, we waited aboot half an hour!! Then the speaker came on AGAIN and sayed our flight got delayed and changed AGAIN!!! So, we ONCE AGAIN walked, literally, across the airport, AGAIN!!! Then we finally got on the plane, BUT, when on the plane, the pilot got on the speaker and sayed that there was some technical difficulties and could not lift off for another half an hourk!!! GRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!! Then finally the thing was fixed and we were off. And just when I thought it couldn't get any worse, the pilot says that there is a huge thunder storm in direct path of the route, and we had to go completly around the HUMONGOUS CLOUD OF DOOM!!! And that put on aboot another hour to our flight!!!! But finally we got home around 9 p.m. and I unpacked and whent to bed. Today, I'm having Levy over for some catching up. To bad John couldn't. *sobs* Ohhhh well. and if you think I had a bad day. Well......your right. And at the same time, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!!

Hello Everybody, Stuff happens, and I'm usually around to see it. Such as..................The Evil School, that will start in 5 days. CURSE THOU SCHOOL, THE DAY OF JUDGEMENT DRAWS NEAR!!!!! In other news, in 2 days, I'm going to Galvastan with Count Sphenmendenlinmanshan VIII, Business Man Levingston, and King Lord Sir Dr. Linmindenmansin II Esq. For the weekend, so I, The Super Hurricane, probably will not be posting until then. I know I will be missed by my fans, but if I'm not missed, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!

It has been pretty eventfull lately, I've been goofin with my buds, alot. (Levy, John, and Jake) And Just recently I went to Levy's sister's Bat Mitzvah. The only thing that was the least bit cool was the after party, which was awsome, ish. Anyways I'm currently at Levy's house and goofin around, I'll post later. And in the mean time, IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!

GRRRRR!!! In less than 2 weeks, school will once again start. :'-( WHY MUST LIFE BE CRUEL!!!! Oh well, In other news, I've beaten Spider-Man 2 in one day!! And I unlocked Super Hard Mode in Sonic Heroes!!! DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! And I Goofed with Levy today, but had to go home early cause he had chores, and other crap like that. Oh well. Waka Waka Doo Doo Ya!! IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!!!!!
